title: Convert .txt to .pdf v1.2
description:
The name says enough.
This program will let you convert your own .txt files into Adobe .pdf files.

1. browse your .txt file
2. click the convert button.
So simple is that, the pdf file is now saved in the same directory as the txt file.

Changes is V1.1:
* The pdf is now saved in the same directory as your source text file.
* The pdf has the same name as the source text file but with the extension .pdf.
* You can see a preview from your created pdf file.

Convert .txt to .pdf V1.2 (Released 19-08-2013):
* You can set the file path of your new .pdf file.
* You can set a name for your new .pdf file.
* Version history dialog.
